content: video game format. If you want to see how well the Tabletop Role-playing Game could be initially translated into a video game format, with all its facets like player progression, Class progression, combat, and actual roleplay choice in dialogues, then Early Access will be a good experience for you. As previously mentioned, however, don't expect a fully-working game that allows you to play non-stop comfortably.
